description: - **Friction**: Multiple agents in solve/research pipelines can fail at different stages - **Pain point**: No clear error recovery, retry logic, or user-friendly error messages mentioned - **Impact**: Users don't know if they should retry, modify input, or wait
title: 3. Agent Error States

descriptionHistory.description: - **Friction**: Multiple agents in solve/research pipelines can fail at different stages - **Pain point**: No clear error recovery, retry logic, or user-friendly error messages mentioned - **Impact**: Users don't know if they should retry, modify input, or wait
